The ten disasters that a mendicant who a: What they have achieved falls away.
They don’t refine their good qualities.
They lead the spiritual life dissatisfied.
They go mad and lose their mind.
They feel lost when they die.
After death, they are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
